Posts.Content: hi judy. I hope you are doing well. my daughter has breast cancer stage 4 and has mets to the bone and in the pleura around her lungs. she is going on a regimin of navelbin.she tried taxol and xeloda but they didn,t work. i pray that this drug works.what treatments did you take?
Posts.Title: Breast CA-now mets to liver and bone
